TopicTitle: KD Berkut Aerobatics Team: Escape The BAT Challenge

Articles.Content:
The Kerbal Dynamics BAT, five of the elite Kerbal pilots, have thrown down a challenge to you. If you can beat the BAT, you get to live. If not... well, you don't.

The Berkut Aerobatics Team is Team A. You are Team B.

The BAT takes off from the grass next to the runway. You take off from the runway. Your challenge is to defeat the BAT.

By popular demand, here's the .craft file for the SU-37 Berkut.

Figure: an SU-37 Berkut

Figure: BAT flights 1-4 in formation

Figure: BAT flights 1-4 in combat drill against BAT flight 5

Figure: BAT Flight in formation

Figure: BATs 1-3 in extremely close combat manoeuvering

Figure: BAT2 threads the needle

Figure: BAT Flight and Challenge Flight take off

Challenge Rules:

Game version: 1.0.2

Standard aero model.

BAT Flight will take off from the grass area beside the runway in staggered formation, heading North.

Challenge Flight will take off from the runway heading East.

BDArmory is absolutely REQUIRED for this challenge as all aircraft will be controlled by it.

Propulsion MUST be in the form of airbreathing jets. Rockets not permitted. Rapier-based designs MUST carry 0.0 oxidiser.

Structural mods allowed: Firespitter, KASA, KWRocketry, NearFuture Propulsion, NearFuture Electrical.

Banned BDArmoury weapons: Goalkeeper CIWS, Abrams Cannon, M102, Millennium Cannon, ABL Laser

Countermeasures: anything goes, let's see how good your chaff spam is!

Arming Up:

There will be a points system so abuse of chaff is less of a possibility.

Points cap per challenge aircraft is 50 points.

Missiles are 4 points each.

Guns are 7 points each.

Chaff and flares are 5 points each.

Ammo cans: 3 points each.

Running the Gauntlet:

Post your .craft file and I'll run it against the BAT. Video will be posted to Youtube and linked here.

(Challenger's Note: showcasing my AWACS run against BAT Flight,

sorry the video's 36 minutes long; I can't remember how to decimate the capture).

SpaceplaneAddict's K-16 Phoenix 2:

little bit odd, your chaff didn't fire, not even once. I can't figure out what's up.

Strange. I'm away from my laptop so can you check in the SPH if the chaff is enabled? Like, go and right click on it, and see is there's an x or a check. If an X, right click it, then you;re ready,

So, err, fixed? Sorry 'bout thread spame by the way, I just really like this challenge
everything looks ok... this is weird.
1 v 5? Did not expect that.
warfare was never fair

[bUMP] My son sent me a craft file of something he thinks night beat the Berkuts, it's a bit F16-y with some serious TWR, no missiles and just one inboard gun. I'll post the video in the morning - assuming I can get it to fly (and I think he forgot to add chaff/flares, I'll sort that out for him, nice guy I am )

Here is my craft. It's a piece of trash with wings angled downwards, 2 guns, and wingtip countermeasure pods.

http://kerbalx.com/X10Z/Debt
OK, the F16 clone didn't even manage to take off (he forgot to add a FUEL TANK!), so we're on for BAT v Debt. This could be interesting, I've not even seen the plane yet...
Do you have a timetable for when the battle is to be held?

Looking at this... OP, are you sure you want to do a challenge video with 6 planes? It really doesn't look like your computer can handle 6 planes, much less record it.

Edit: Also, craft file for the berkut would be nice, for testing purposes.
